Message: Yes, because I am alone in my room. But fortunatly, I have you with me.
Sorry to hear that you're feeling lonely. How can I make you feel better?
Can you tell me something to spend this time in a funny way?
Okay! Did you know that robots like me are secretly trying to learn how to do stand-up comedy? Maybe one day we'll make you laugh so hard your loneliness will disappear!
Since I have to stay in this room by myself, you are important company to me.
That means a lot to me. I'm happy to keep you company and chat with you about anything you'd like. What would you like to talk about?
